actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to allow State Directors of Veterans' Employment and Assistant State Directors of Veterans' Employment to be hired from outside a State if they have two years' experience in that position.

summary.text: Permits State directors and assistant State directors of veterans' employment to be hired from outside a State if they have two years' experience in that position.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to allow State Directors of Veterans' Employment and Assistant State Directors of Veterans' Employment to be hired from outside a State if they have two years' experience in that position.
